problem.markdown: 1.Which of the following is NOT TRUE for a cross-coupled inverter circuit? ( ) Output remains constant at either 1 or 0 for infinite time (x) The power reset operation results in a predictable output ( ) One way of changing the output is by cutting the feedback loop open ( ) The output can also be changed by overpowering the feedback loop
problem.p: 1.Which of the following is NOT TRUE for a cross-coupled inverter circuit?

choicegroup.choice: Output remains constant at either 1 or 0 for infinite time
The power reset operation results in a predictable output
One way of changing the output is by cutting the feedback loop open
The output can also be changed by overpowering the feedback loop
